name: Unnamed Space Game (milkchoco)
description:
This is my second game, which I made because I thought game juice was interesting. It was supposed to be filled with juice, but I got side-tracked and ended up making a game that supports touchscreen. It also lacks a name. Wonderful.

Font by Speak the Sky under CC BY 4.0

Music by Abstraction (Ludum Dare 38 - Track 6)

ISLAND JOY 16 PALETTE by Kerrie Lake
